title: Automation Tester
jobDescription:
ApMoSys is looking for Automation Tester to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  1. Responsible for the design, development, and testing of programs that run automated tests of hardware/software throughout the development cycle.
  2. Collaborate with Software Developers and QA Analysts
  3. Investigate issues, bugs, and feedback as they arise
  4. Prepare reports and analysis
  5. Use test automation framework

title: Lead - HR
jobDescription:
ApMoSys is looking for Lead - HR to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • An HR Professional is responsible for executing various human resources (HR) functions within an organization
Key responsibilities include:
  • Recruiting and staffing: sourcing, screening, and hiring new employees
  • Employee relations: addressing and resolving employee concerns, complaints, and conflicts
  • Performance management: conducting performance evaluations and providing feedback to employees
  • Employee development: creating and implementing employee training programs and career development plans
  • Compensation and benefits: administering employee compensation and benefits programs, such as salaries, bonuses, and insurance
  • Compliance: ensuring compliance with federal and state employment laws and regulations
  • Policy development and administration: creating, updating, and communicating HR policies and procedures
  • Employee records management: maintaining accurate and up-to-date employee files and records
  • Diversity and inclusion: promoting and fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace culture

title: Performance Tester
jobDescription:
ApMoSys is looking for Performance Tester to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • Creating and executing performance test scripts using a variety of tools and techniques
  • Identifying and prioritizing performance test scenarios based on business needs, risks, and impact
  • Analyzing and interpreting test results, identifying performance bottlenecks and recommending solutions to improve performance and scalability
  • Collaborating with development teams to identify and resolve performance issues
  • Maintaining and updating performance test scripts and test environments to reflect changes in software and system configurations
  • Documenting and reporting on test results, including performance metrics, graphs, and charts
  • Strong technical background and understanding of software development processes
  • Strong problem-solving and analytical skills are also essential, as well as proficiency in performance testing tools and techniques

title: Senior Consultant
jobDescription:
ApMoSys is looking for Senior Consultant to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • Lead project teams and manage client relationships
  • Develop and implement project plans, schedules, and budgetsProvide expert advice and guidance to clients on a wide range of strategic and operational issues
  • Conduct research and analyze data to support decision-making
  • Develop and deliver presentations to senior management and stakeholders
  • Build and maintain strong relationships with clients and stakeholders
  • Mentor and train junior consultantsStay up-to-date with the latest industry developments and trends

title: r d officer
jobDescription:
The R&D Team Leader is expected to lead a team of 2-3 chemists to develop targeted specialty chemicals molecules from lab scale through to successful validation on the plant scale.


Responsibilities
Undertake experiments to develop new synthetic route
Daily review of experiment results to guide R&D chemists
Conduct literature survey
Propose innovative solutions to improve product cost and quality
Scale up and validate process on kilo-scale pilot plant
Responsible for successful validation on pilot and plant scale
Successful handover of the process to the Production department
Provide timely solutions for troubleshooting plant deviations
Conduct regular training for development executives

title: Sales Associate
tagsAndSkills: Lead generation,Research Lead,Interpersonal skills,Sales,Customer service,Research,Sales Associate,Service quality
jobDescription:
We are hiring a Sales Associate! Careers @ ICEBERG Media We are looking for a result - driven Sales Associate to be responsible for all sales job duties, from generating leads to closing sales.

Role /  Responsibilities: 

Identifying prospects and evaluating their position in the industry; researching and analyzing sales options & scope of business 

Selling products by establishing contact and developing relationships with prospects; recommending solutions. 

Maintaining relationships with clients by providing support, information, and guidance; researching and recommending new opportunities; recommending profit and service improvements. 

Identifying product improvements or new products by remaining current on industry trends, market activities, and competitors. 

Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to mitigate and address these issues 

Preparing reports by collecting, analyzing, and summarizing information 

Maintaining quality service by establishing and enforcing organization standards. 

Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed 

Build productive trust relationships with customersneeded Skills: 

Basic understanding of sales principles and customer service practices 

Proficiency in English 

Solid communication, convincing and interpersonal skills 

A friendly and energetic personality with customer service focus
